cash.name: Cash
cash.description: Money. Used for buying most stuff.

offshore.name: Offshore Cash
offshore.description: Money, stored in your bank account. Used for Offshore Payday and buying contracts.

continental_coins.name: Continental Coins
continental_coins.description: Alternative currency, used for buying expensive stuff.

crimespree.name: Crime Spree
crimespree.description: A chain of heists, used for farming continental coins.

crimespree_record.name: Crime Spree Record
crimespree_record.description: The record for a user's highest crime spree level.

join.name: Join Time
join.description: The time when a criminal joins CRIME.NET.

char.name: Character
char.description: The criminal's identity. (Or what player they choose to play as.)

weapon.name: Signature Weapon
weapon.description: The signature weapon of a user.

daily.name: Daily Reward Timestamp
daily.description: Timestamp for daily reward for logging onto CRIME.NET.

exp.name: Experience
exp.description: Amount of experience a criminal has.

reputation.name: Reputation Level
reputation.description: The level of reputation a criminal has.

infamy.name: Infamy
infamy.description: The infamy level of a criminal.
